know everything instantaneously. :-)

Delicious math language makes me very hungry, but eating with my fingers

comments.author: Michelle Beissel

comments.text:
I must admit I did not listen to the speech, but I don't see a relationship 
with *unpredictability.* -- this is completely deterministic.

A nice way to produce dragon curves btw is to reinterpret binary numbers as 
numbers in base (1+i), iow map the natural integers in binary 
representation *sum b_j 2^j* to the gaussian integers *sum b_j (1+i)^j* -- 
as you map increasing natural integers the image of the mapping fills the 
2D grid of gaussian integers by ever larger dragon curve shapes.
